00022 enum BtBipEncoding {
00023 
00024     // BtBip specified standard encodings
00025     BtBipJpeg,
00026     BtBipGif,
00027     BtBipWBmp,
00028     BtBipPng,
00029     BtBipJpeg2000,
00030     BtBipBmp,
00031 
00032     BtBipInvalidEncoding
00033 
00034     // BtBip User defineable encodings
00035 };
00036 
00038 enum BtBipTransformation {
00039     BtBipNone = 0,
00040     BtBipStretch = 1,
00041     BtBipCrop = 2,
00042     BtBipFill = 3,
00043     BtBipInvalidTransformation = 4
00044 };

00106

00109

00112

00115

00118

00121     
00123     void GetImageDim(ImageDim& dim) const { dim = m_dim; }
00124

00126 
00128     UINT32 GetMaxImageSize() const { return m_max_size; }
00129

00132

00382 class BtBipImagingCapabilities
00383 {
00384 public:
00385     typedef Vector<BtBipImageFormatPtr> BtBipImageFormatList;
00386     typedef Vector<BtBipAttachmentFormatPtr> BtBipAttachmentFormatList;
00387 
00388     BtBipImagingCapabilities();
00389     ~BtBipImagingCapabilities();
00390 
00391     void SetPreferredFormat(const BtBipImageFormat& format) { m_preferred_format = format; }
00392 
00394     void SetPreferredFormat(BtBipEncoding encoding, UINT16 width, UINT16 height, BtBipTransformation transformation, UINT32 max_size);
00395 
00397     /* The height of an image is calculated using the formula H=(W*H2)/W2.
00398        The aspect ratio of the image is not changed.
00399        @param min_width min. width of image
00400        @param max_width max. width of image
00401        @param max_height max. height of image
00402     */
00403     void SetPreferredFormat(BtBipEncoding encoding, UINT16 min_width, UINT16 max_width, UINT16 max_height, BtBipTransformation transformation, UINT32 max_size);
00404 
00406     /* An image can be transformed freely, the aspect ratio may be changed. */
00407     void SetPreferredFormat(BtBipEncoding encoding, UINT16 min_width, UINT16 min_height, UINT16 max_width, UINT16 max_height, BtBipTransformation transformation, UINT32 max_size);
00408 
00409     void AddImageFormat(const BtBipImageFormatPtr& format) { m_supported_img_formats.PushBack(format); }
00410     void AddImageFormat(BtBipEncoding, UINT16 res_x, UINT16 res_y, UINT32 max_size);
00411     
00412     void AddAttachmentFormat(const BtBipAttachmentFormatPtr& format) { m_supported_attach_formats.PushBack(format); }
00413     void AddAttachmentFormat(ApoxiMimeTypeId mime_type, const String& charset);
00414     
00415     void SetDpofOptions(UINT8 dpof_options) { m_dpof_options = dpof_options; }
00416     void SetFilterParamters(UINT8 filter_params) { m_filter_params = filter_params; }
00417 
00418     const BtBipImageFormat& GetPreferredFormat() const { return m_preferred_format; }
00419     BtBipEncoding GetPrefEncoding() const { return m_preferred_format.GetEncoding(); }
00420     UINT8   GetDpofOptions() const { return m_dpof_options; }
00421     UINT8   GetFilterParams() const { return m_filter_params; }
00422 
00423 
00424     // fix size min(w|h)==max(w|h)
00425     // w/aspect minh == maxh
00426     // n/aspect ratio min(w|h) like set
00427     UINT16      GetPrefMinWidth() const { return m_preferred_format.GetImageDim().min_width; }
00428     UINT16      GetPrefMaxWidth() const { return m_preferred_format.GetImageDim().max_width; }
00429     UINT16      GetPrefMinHeight() const { return m_preferred_format.GetImageDim().min_height; }
00430     UINT16      GetPrefMaxHeight() const { return m_preferred_format.GetImageDim().max_height; }
00431     UINT16      GetPrefTransformation() const { return m_preferred_format.GetTransformation(); }
00432     UINT32      GetPrefMaxSize() const { return m_preferred_format.GetMaxImageSize(); }
00433 
00434     BOOLEAN     IsDpofOptionSupported(UINT8 dpof_options) const { return (m_dpof_options & dpof_options) > 0; }
00435     BOOLEAN     IsFilterSupported(UINT8 filter) const { return (m_filter_params & filter) > 0; }
00436 
00437     const BtBipImageFormatList& GetSupportedImageFormatList() const { return m_supported_img_formats; }
00438     const BtBipAttachmentFormatList& GetSupportedAttachmentFormatList() const { return m_supported_attach_formats; }
00439 
00440 private:
00441     UINT8                   m_dpof_options;
00442     UINT8                   m_filter_params;
00443 
00444     BtBipImageFormat            m_preferred_format;
00445     BtBipImageFormatList        m_supported_img_formats;
00446     BtBipAttachmentFormatList   m_supported_attach_formats;
00447 };

00529     void SetNativeSize(UINT32 size) { m_native_fmt.SetMaxImageSize(size); }

00538 
00539     const BtBipImageFormat& GetNativeFormat() const { return m_native_fmt; }

00542     UINT16 GetNativeHeight() const { return m_native_fmt.GetImageDim().min_height; }
